Package entity

Class Monster

java.lang.Object
entity.Entity
entity.LivingEntity
entity.Monster
public class Monster extends LivingEntity
The Monster class represents a monster entity in the game, which is a type of LivingEntity.

      Parameters:
      location - The location of the monster.
      weight - The weight of the monster.
      health - The health of the monster.
      maxHealth - The maximum health of the monster.
      armor - The armor of the monster.
      maxArmor - The maximum armor of the monster.
      strength - The strength of the monster.
      maxStrength - The maximum strength of the monster.
      magic - The magic of the monster.
      maxMagic - The maximum magic of the monster.
      inventory - The inventory of the monster.
      type - The type of the monster.
      entityManager - The entity manager for managing the monster.
      level - The level of the monster.
      experience - The experience of the monster.
      spriteManager - The sprite manager for the monster.
